comments: Let A be the Hessenberg matrix of order n, defined by: A[1,j]=1, A[i,i]:=11, (i>1), A[i,i-1]=-1, and A[i,j]=0 otherwise. Then, for n>=2, a(n-1)=-charpoly(A,x^(n-1)). - _Milan Janjic_, Feb 21 2010Sequence lists all nonnegative solutions to x^k == 1 (mod 11), where k is a member of A045572. - _Bruno Berselli_, Jan 18 2016
